Size: Usually 1-2 m tall, but up to 4 m.
Stem: Bluish-green circular pads up to 40 cm diameter with clusters of numerous barbed bristles and sharp spines 1-4 cm long.
Flowers: Yellow, with reddish streaks at the back, 5-8 cm across.
FruitSeeds: Pink to purple, barrel-shaped, with fine hairs or bristles.
DistinguishingFeatures: Circular bluish pads distinguish from other Opuntioid cacti (*Opuntia* species).
